attributes.additional_details: Lets get as many signatures  as we can in a bid to keep page 3 in our papers sign   make sure it does not get banned can you imagine your morning paper without page 3 i know i could not

rejection.details: In the UK, the press is not subject to state regulation. The Government believes that this is fundamental to our democracy. That is why the government does not interfere in what a newspaper or magazine chooses to publish.
